alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jackson; Coastal Matagorda; Inland Jackson; Inland Matagorda; Matagorda Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 19 at 11:25AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jackson and southwestern Matagorda Counties through NOON CST... At 1124 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Indianola, or near Port Oconnor, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Matagorda, Palacios, South Texas Nuclear Plant, Point Comfort, La Ward, Alamo Beach, Indianola, Schicke Point, Olivia, Lolita, Blessing, Port Alto, Vanderbilt, Wadsworth and Lake Texana Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jackson; Coastal Matagorda; Inland Jackson; Inland Matagorda; Matagorda Islands
